cause.description:
Resurrect the Big Band Era in your life as often as possible by dressing in the appropriate attire, speaking as if you had just been launched into the past about 70-80 years, and anything else you could possibly think of.
1. The Big Band Era must be brought back.
2. Men and women should go back to wearing their modest clothing.
cause.mission: resurrect the Big Band Era from the 1920's to the 1940's.
cause.name: Resurrecting the Big Band Era
